intro.name: Introduce
intro.description: Hello, I'm web developer Sim Hansol.

tab-1.name: KSCA
tab-1.description: Based on the spirit of Noblesse Oblige, it is a non-profit organization created to realize a society where individuals and companies live together by easing polarization through various social contribution activities.

tab-2.name: Peopleyoutube
tab-2.description: Peopleyoutube stands for Open People Creator Academy and is a professional creator & mobile show host training agency.

tab-3.name: Nudgestory
tab-3.description: Nudge Story is a PR company that creates a NUDGE effect through stories. Through Nudge's own PR, we are inducing smooth intervention and delivering better service to people.

calculator.name: Hansol Calculator
calculator.description: It is a calculator made with the motif of a window calculator. I implemented the basic function of the calculator and implemented the basic design of the calculator.

color-vision.name: Colorvision
color-vision.description: Color vision is a game to remember and match the colors presented. It's designed to increase color discrimination.
